title: Blockchain Development Framework Selection
description: We need to choose the primary blockchain development framework for our upcoming DeFi project. This decision will impact our development timeline, security features, and scalability. Please vote for your preferred option based on technical merit, community support, and long-term viability.

additional_info.context: Our team is building a decentralized lending protocol that requires high throughput and low gas fees.
additional_info.deadline_note: Voting closes in 3 days. Final decision will be announced after thorough analysis of results.
